description: Used to log details associated with a capture
title: captureObj

___scriptEndDate.description: Record when the capture script ended

___processedPicturesCount.description: Number of pictures captued, in some situations multiple files might be processed in batch

___storedRawSize.description: Size in bytes of the RAW file(s)

___scriptStartDate.description: Record when the capture script started

___storedJpgSize.description: Size in bytes of the JPG file(s)

___totalCaptureSize.description: Size in bytes of all pictures captured (SUM storedJpgSize and storedRawSize)
